pkgmetadata.longdescription: bomail is an experimental system for organizing and interacting with email.It can be installed with pip3 (the python package manager) via pip3 install bomail.This software is free.Homepage and information: https://www.bowaggoner.com/bomail/Source: https://www.bitbucket.org/bowaggonerpublic/bomailVersion: 0.9.4.1TODOs: - Tree view for threads (see reply structure rather than list by date) - Digital signatures and encryptionCompleted: - (0.9.3.0) Use XDG spec for where to put data and config - (0.9.2.0) Respect the reply-to header on emails
